actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to House from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, H. Rept. 94-1687.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.
Measure laid on table in House, S. 2742 passed in lieu.

official_title: A bill to amend the act approved January 8, 1971, establishing the Chesapeake and Ohio Canal National Historical Park, to provide that a segment of the Chesapeake and Ohio Canal shall be designated in honor of the memory of Justice William O. Douglas.

summary.text: Designates a specified segment of the Chesapeake and Ohio Canal within the Chesapeake and Ohio Canal National Historical Park as the Justice William O. Douglas Level.

titles.title: A bill to amend the act approved January 8, 1971, establishing the Chesapeake and Ohio Canal National Historical Park, to provide that a segment of the Chesapeake and Ohio Canal shall be designated in honor of the memory of Justice William O. Douglas.
